about_the_game:
*WARNING* This DLC is only for the Windows Platform. Buying it will have no effect on Linux or macOS versions!

Contents of this DLC:

1- Color-Edit mode(*) for Dual Souls: The Last Bearer, and any future DLC color sets for all fighters!
2- Unreleased Europe region version of Gameboy Advance classic game: Dual Blades (2003).
3- Slashers: The Power Battle PC Edition
* Color-Edit mode can also be unlocked by playing Journey Mode and reaching Level 600.

# Default key configuration for Slashers: The Power Battle
# SL (Select): Numpad0
# BS (Back): NumpadEnter

Dual Blades GBA uses a modified version of VisualBoy Advance (VBA) 1.7.2.
VBA is licensed under Gnu Public License v2.
All modified source code can be found here:
detailed_description:
*WARNING* This DLC is only for the Windows Platform. Buying it will have no effect on Linux or macOS versions!

Contents of this DLC:

1- Color-Edit mode(*) for Dual Souls: The Last Bearer, and any future DLC color sets for all fighters!
2- Unreleased Europe region version of Gameboy Advance classic game: Dual Blades (2003).
3- Slashers: The Power Battle PC Edition
* Color-Edit mode can also be unlocked by playing Journey Mode and reaching Level 600.

# Default key configuration for Slashers: The Power Battle
# SL (Select): Numpad0
# BS (Back): NumpadEnter

Dual Blades GBA uses a modified version of VisualBoy Advance (VBA) 1.7.2.
VBA is licensed under Gnu Public License v2.
All modified source code can be found here:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 64-bit Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 (Graphic Drivers: nVidia 310, AMD 12.11), OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most gamepads and arcade sticks can be configured to play.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.4 or later.
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo Processor (2GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most gamepads and arcade sticks can be configured to play.

name: Dual Souls Complete Edition

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo 2 GHz, AMD Athlon™ X2 2.2 GHz, or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB Video card, DirectX 9-compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Most gamepads and arcade sticks can be configured to play.

short_description: Unlock Color-Edit mode for Dual Souls, and have 2 classic prequels: Dual Blades GBA EU (2003) and Slashers: The Power Battle! (2013)
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
